title: 820-2796 Ts0P and SMC PID??????HELP PLEASE
message: I have an 820-2796 with no liquid, no drop damage. Runs sluggish and Throws Ts0P error ( I know usually track pad sensor). The SMC PID doesn't ring a bell... Anyone have any idea what it is and where I should start? Fan runs high, and machine is sluggish.

title: 820-2796 Ts0P and SMC PID??????HELP PLEASE
message: As you said, trackpad/cable/connector. And yes it will be corrosion in the connector

title: 820-2796 Ts0P and SMC PID??????HELP PLEASE
message: @dukefawks... No corrosion, but I think I will switch it out anyway... does the SMC PID trip too if the Ts0P trips?

title: 820-2796 Ts0P and SMC PID??????HELP PLEASE
message: @dukefawks... No corrosion, but I think I will switch it out anyway... does the SMC PID trip too if the Ts0P trips?

title: 820-2796 Ts0P and SMC PID??????HELP PLEASE
message: Pin 8 and 9 are data to the thermal sensor. Measure if they make it from the board to the trackpad.
